article_title: Small Taxes That Create Big Costs

article_metadata.description: The good news is government receipts are up. This helps the economy. The bad news is a lot of these receipts are coming out of your pocket. Not unexpectedly, the 2013 tax increases have taken effect and taxes are up. So far, the federal government has collected over $1.8 trillion [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Parrish
